short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items from any online store to one central wishlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description: LinkedWish allows you to easily add items from Amazon and other web stores to a centralized wishlist, making it simple to organize and share your favorite products with friends. With just a click, you can save products directly from product pages and access them later through our website. Enjoy a streamlined shopping experience and never lose track of your must-have items again!

Features:
- Save products to your wishlist with one click
- Share your wishlist with friends
- Organize items from multiple webstore domains
- View, manage, and remove items from your wishlist

Affiliate Marketing Disclosure:
The Linked Wish application (including extension, website and database)is completely free to use for consumers. We generate revenue by converting the item links you add to your wishlist into affiliate links. This doesn't cost buyers any additional money but does allow us to receive 1% to 10% of the value of the purchase as revenue which we use to pay for our database and hosting servers and fund further development.
